column4: Not bad. See you don't have Vissegerd in your deck. Here, he's yours.
There's Olivier at the Kingfisher. I play him sometimes. And there was a spell there I hoped to win Gael off Madman Lugos, but after I beat him once the bugger would never play me again.

The tome you hold in your hands, commissioned by the Most Gracious Duke de Berry, shall make use of magic most arcane to display which gwent unique cards are currently missing from your collection. You need but open it and repeat in your mind How 'bout a round of gwent?" and the following shall appear:"
Congratulations! You have collected all currently available unique cards!
Number of unique cards which can still be won from players of no particular renown or skill
Reduces the Strength of specific units on the battlefield to 1. Can also remove another active Hostile Environment effect.

Reduces the Strength of specific units on the battlefield to 1. Can also remove another active Hostile Environment effect.
Reduces the Strength of specific units on the battlefield to 1. Can also remove another active Hostile Environment effect.
Removes all active Hostile Environment effects.
Destroy the strongest unit(s) on the battlefield.
Destroy your opponent's strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined Strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.
Destroy your opponent's strongest Ranged Combat unit(s) if the combined Strength of all his or her Ranged Combat units is 10 or more.
Destroy your opponent's strongest Siege Combat unit(s) if the combined Strength of all his or her Siege Combat units is 10 or more.
Swap with a unit on your own battlefield to return it to your hand.
Can be placed in either the Close Combat or Ranged Combat row.
Doubles the Strength of all units in the same row (doesn't stack with other Commander's Horn).
Transforms into another unit when affected by Regrowth.
Choose a unit from your discard pile and play it instantly (except Hero Cards).
Instantly summons specific unit(s) from your deck or hand.
Instantly summons specific unit(s) from your deck or hand.
Place on your opponent's battlefield and draw 1 card from your deck.
Multiplies its Strength by the number of linked cards in the same row.
Increases by 1 the Strength of all units in the same row (excluding itself).
When this unit is removed from the battlefield, it summons a new unit to take its place.
Triggers transformation of all Hidden Power units in the same row.
Immune to the effects of other units and leaders.
Pick a Biting Frost card from your deck and play it instantly.
Pick an Impenetrable Fog card from your deck and play it instantly.
Pick a Torrential Rain card from your deck and play it instantly.
Pick any Hostile Environment card from your deck and play it instantly.
Removes all active Hostile Environment effects.
Destroy your opponent's strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined Strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.
Destroy your opponent's strongest Ranged Combat unit(s) if the combined Strength of all his or her Ranged Combat units is 10 or more.
Destroy your opponent's strongest Siege Combat unit(s) if the combined Strength of all his or her Siege Combat units is 10 or more.
Triggers transformation of all Hidden Power units on Close Combat row.
Triggers transformation of all Hidden Power units on Ranged Combat row.
Triggers transformation of all Hidden Power units on Siege Combat row.
Look at 5 random cards from your opponent's hand.
Passive - Cancel your opponent's Leader Ability.
Draw a card from your opponent’s discard pile.
Passive - Draw 2 extra cards at the beginning of the battle.
Move Agile units to whichever valid row maximizes their strength (don't move units already in optimal row).
Passive - Your units only lose half their Strength under Hostile Environment effects.
Shuffle all cards from each player's graveyard back into their decks.
Discard 2 cards and draw 1 card of your choice from your deck.
Restore a card from your discard pile to your hand.
Passive - Double the Strength of all Spy cards (affects both players).
Passive - Effects that restore a unit to the battlefield restore a randomly-chosen unit (affects both players).
Draw a card from your deck whenever you win a round.
Win whenever there is a draw.
Decide who goes first at the start of a battle.
One randomly-chosen unit stays on your own battlefield after each round.
2 random units from your graveyard are placed on the battlefield at the start of the third round.
